StaticEventIconRenderer - Class in org.codeandmagic.timeline
Implementation of EventIconRenderer that draws an image for the event and optionally a text.
This class performs the actual rendering and also the collision detection.
StaticEventIconRenderer() - Constructor for class org.codeandmagic.timeline.StaticEventIconRenderer
 
StaticEventIconRenderer.EventLabelFormat - Interface in org.codeandmagic.timeline
A StaticEventIconRenderer.EventLabelFormat can be injected into a StaticEventIconRenderer to determine what label to draw next to the event icon;
StaticEventIconRenderer.NameEventLabelFormat - Class in org.codeandmagic.timeline
An StaticEventIconRenderer.EventLabelFormat that return the event name.
StaticEventIconRenderer.NameEventLabelFormat() - Constructor for class org.codeandmagic.timeline.StaticEventIconRenderer.NameEventLabelFormat
 
StaticEventIconRenderer.TimeAndNameEventLabelFormat - Class in org.codeandmagic.timeline
Subclass of StaticEventIconRenderer.NameEventLabelFormat that in addition to the Event name, it also displays the date of the event
